experience.name: ZALORA Singapore
experience.details: Full stack engineer tasked to develop a web application for mobile API abstraction. Currently the sole-developer on the project. Also, assisted with front-end development of their global fashion group website.

education.name: National University of Singapore
education.studies: B.Hons Computer Science with a minor in Economics
education.others: Specializing in Interactive Media and Artificial Intelligence

education.name: University of Birmingham
education.studies: Read Computational Vision, Machine Learning, Operating Systems, Chemistry for Engineering and Game Theory

education.name: Sunway College, Subang Jaya
education.studies: Took Cambridge GCE A-Levels for Chemistry, Physics, Economics and Math

cca.name: NUS Sheares Hall Dance (DanShers)
cca.desc: Danshers is a group of dancers from Sheares Hall, heavily involved in three concerts throughout the year mainly, Good Luck Concert (GLC), SHout! and Dance Uncensored. I was the choreographer for Good Luck Concert 2014 and performed for all other events throughout my stay in Sheares Hall.

cca.name: Directorate, NUS Cultural Activities Club
cca.desc: NUS Cultural Activities Club (CAC) consists of 11 sub-club excluding the main directorate. Thus, I was in-charged of club's logistics and collation of resources especially venues and manpower for performance and rehearsals.

cca.name: Camp Estrella, NUS Cultural Activities Club
cca.desc: Camp Estrella is a social camp to unite and orientate freshman on the cultural lifestyle in NUS. I was in-charged of the camp's internal affairs which are the program flow, logistics, resources as well as food and welfare of the participants.

cca.name: CAC+US Concert, NUS Cultural Activities Club
cca.desc: CAC+US is one of the largest concert in NUS incorporating performances from all of NUS CAC cultural sub-clubs. I organized and planned the program flow for the concert. I was also the liaison between the main committee and the sub-clubs.

cca.name: Cultural Week, NUS Cultural Activities Club
cca.desc: Cultural Week aims to promote awareness of NUS cultural clubs to the students mid-academic year. I was in-charged of internal publicity as well as liaison between the committee and the sub-clubs.

cca.name: Sheares Welcome and Orientation Committee (SWOC)
cca.desc: Organized a 10 day camp for incoming freshman into Sheares Hall, NUS in which I coordinated and executed two main projects, flash mob and finale night, for the camp. I also assisted with drafting and execution of programmes for the camp.

cca.name: A-Levels Student Council
cca.desc: In-charged of archiving, records and drafting of letters and proposals of the Student Council. Also, Co-organized several events for my peers and A-Levels cohort.

cca.name: Love Is A Many Splendoured Thing! The Musical (LIAMST!)
cca.desc: LIAMST! is an external charitable project in a form of a concert organized by Mr Kingsley Row. I was charged to lead a group of student dancers and choregraphed dance-pieces from a bygone era including the Rock & Roll and Charleston.
